Study: Features of 20 133 UK patients in hospital with covid-19 using the ISARIC WHO Clinical Characterisation Protocol: prospective observational cohort study.
Study Population: 208 acute care hospitals in England, Wales, and Scotland between 6 February and 19 April 2020

Study: Risk factors for adverse clinical outcomes in patients with COVID-19: A systematic review and meta-analysis
Obesity and COVID-19 Severity in a Designated Hospital in Shenzhen, China
Study Population: Third People’s Hospital of Shenzhen, from 11 January 2020 to 16 February 2020 (followed until 26 March 2020)

Study: The association of cardiovascular disease and other pre-existing comorbidities with COVID-19 mortality: A systematic review and meta-analysis
Study Population: PubMed (MEDLINE), OVID (MEDLINE, HEALTHSTAR), SCOPUS, and medrxiv.org from October 1, 2019 to May 1, 2026

Study: Effects of pre-existing morbidities on occurrence of death among COVID-19 disease patients: A systematic review and meta-analysis
Study Population: Medline, Web of Science, Scopus, and CINAHL were searched, concluded on May 01, 2020

Study: OpenSAFELY: factors associated with COVID-19-related hospital death in the linked electronic health records of 17 million adult NHS patients.
Study Population: TPP general practice in England from February 1 to April 25, 2020.

Study: Role of Drugs Affecting the Renin-Angiotensin-Aldosterone System on Susceptibility and Severity of COVID-19: A Large Case-Control Study from Zheijang Province, China.
Study Population: 14 hospitals in Zhejiang province, China between Jan 10 and Feb 28, 2020 and confirmed diagnosis of Covid-19 infection were included

Study: The role of comorbidities and clinical predictors of severe disease in COVID-19: a systematic review and meta-analysis Emails
Study Population: PubMed, Scopus, EMBASE, Web of Science, and Google Scholar searched through March 12 2026

Study: Does comorbidity increase the risk of patients with COVID-19: evidence from meta-analysis
Study Population: PubMed (Medline), EMBASE, Springer, Web of Science, and Cochrane Library databases up to date to March 1, 2020

Study: Preliminary Estimates of the Prevalence of Selected Underlying Health Conditions Among Patients with Coronavirus Disease 2019 — United States, February 12–March 28, 2020 [MMWR Morb Mortal Wkly Rep]
Study Population: CDC passive surveillance registry as of March 28, 2021

Study: Prognostic value of C-reactive protein in patients with COVID-19
Study Population: Eastern Campus of Renmin Hospital of Wuhan University from Jan 30 to Feb 20, 2028

Study: ACP risk grade: a simple mortality index for patients with confirmed or suspected severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 disease (COVID-19) during the early stage of outbreak in Wuhan China
Study Population: Wuhan Hankou Hospital from Jan 21 to Feb 5, 2020
